This site contains notes, data summaries and simulation results for a pragmatic, observer-blinded, randomised controlled clinical trial of a dose of nirsevimab, versus standard care, from six months old to reduce medically attended LRIs among First Nations infants in the NT.

All the code can be found on github.
To access it, use the icon to the top right of the page.
